info.name: AI Commander
info.description: REST API endpoints for the WP Natural Language Commands plugin. This collection allows you to interact with the chatbot programmatically.

request.description: Retrieves all conversations for the current user.

response.name: Get all conversations

request.description: Creates a new conversation with the specified command.

response.name: Create a new conversation

request.description: Retrieves an existing conversation by its UUID.

response.name: Get an existing conversation

formdata.description: Audio file to transcribe (WebM, MP3, WAV, etc.)

request.description: Transcribes an audio file using OpenAI's Whisper API and returns the transcribed text.

formdata.description: Audio file containing the voice command
Optional conversation UUID to add the command to an existing conversation
Optional language code to improve transcription accuracy

request.description: Transcribes an audio file and processes the transcribed text as a command. This endpoint combines audio transcription and command processing in a single request.
Creates a new OpenAI Realtime session with the configured model, voice, and tools. Returns session data including an ephemeral token for WebRTC connection.

Executes a tool with the provided arguments. The arguments parameter should be a JSON string containing the tool parameters. This endpoint is typically used by the OpenAI Realtime API to execute function calls.
